name: Lena Carter
bio: Writes emotionally rich historical fiction with strong female leads.

name: Jasper Lin
bio: Cyberpunk and speculative fiction author with a love for neon cities.

name: Amina Hassan
bio: Tales of self-discovery, faith, and cultural identity in desert landscapes.

name: Carlos Vega
bio: Thrilling techno-mysteries exploring AI, ethics, and paranoia.

name: Yuki Tanaka
bio: Psychological drama inspired by Japanese urban legends.

name: Marcus Reed
bio: Dark fantasy and grim political sagas with richly built worlds.

name: Isabella Moretti
bio: Intrigue, art, and European culture wrapped in thrilling plots.

name: Omar Ndiaye
bio: Myths, family sagas, and African history come alive in his work.

name: Freya Schmidt
bio: Combines historical research and icy survival stories in thrilling narratives.
